staticQuestions.question:
What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

(Rogers proposes cutting defense spending by 10%.) My opponent Rogers wants to disarm our country and hand it over on a silver platter to our enemies.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

If I don't get a good grade, Dr. Hilton, I'm going to talk to the dean about you. You recall that the dean is my mother, don't you?

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

We should legalize gambling in our state because it would be a new source of tax revenue, it would encourage tourists from other states to come and spend money here, and it would cost the state nothing.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

The head of the socialist party claims that Fernandez is by far the best candidate. So Fernandez must be the best candidate.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Hilton, in arguing that she deserved at least a B+ for her work, showed her professor that she was from a poor family and had to work long hours to pay for her schooling.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Ms. Gensler brushed her teeth with Ultra Zest and then attracted boys like a magnet! Wow -- I'm going to get some Ultra Zest, because then I will attract boys too!

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Only men are rational animals. No woman is a man. Therefore no woman is a rational animal.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Academic philosophers these days are all logical positivists. None of them accept a spiritual dimension of humanity.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Almost everyone I know thinks that Buick stock is going to fall sharply. So it surely will.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

How do I know it? Well, Miller told me. How does Miller know it? Well, I told her.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Miller and the other atheists are pretty stupid. They deny God's existence because they can't see him. But who has seen electrons either?

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Brown asked me whether I was still wasting my time at the university.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Volkswagens are inexpensive and get good gas mileage. So you should get a Volkswagen.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Religion originated from myth. Myth, of course, consists in superstitious errors. So religion must be false.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Officer Miller, you can't criticize me for stealing. Didn't I just read in the paper about police corruption?

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

I kept thinking "One little drink won't hurt" as I had one little drink. I repeated this reasoning ten times.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Wong, just accept this and shut up!

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Wilson is probably a Communist. After all, there is nothing in the files to disprove her Communist connections.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Rogers had a beer before taking the exam. Then he got 100%. It's amazing what a beer can do! I'll try it next time.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Either you favor a massive arms buildup, or you aren't a patriotic American.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

My friend Greene with a PhD in physics says that atomic power plants are safe. So she must be right.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

(Smith suggests closing some of the seldom used rapid transit stops.) Smith, my opponent for mayor, evidently wants to shut down all public transportation for our city!

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Since God is love and love is an emotion, God must be an emotion.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

The bible must tell the truth. After all, it is God's word. How do I know that it is God's word? Well, the bible says it is -- and the bible tells the truth.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

As intelligent members of the jury, you can't find my client Jones guilty. Jones grew up in a poor family, as did many of you, and found life difficult. Your vote will show whether you understand this.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

You ask what concrete proposals I have. Well, we need a whole new direction. Our country under president Rogers has been going down the drain. We need to change.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Recent polls say that most people favor Brown, the republican candidate. So I'm going to vote for her.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

The prosecutor asked me, "Where did you hide the money that you stole?"

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

The main reason you buy Chevrolets is that your family taught you that Chevrolet makes the best cars. So your belief that Chevrolets are great cars is clearly wrong.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Each thing in the universe comes into existence and later passes out of existence. So the universe also must have come into existence and must later pass out of existence.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

The sports hero Wilson has a TV ad in which he says that Honda is the best car. Wilson is a great player. So Honda is probably a great car.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Our economic system in the United States is capitalism. The other approach is socialism.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

In your paper, Miller, you express sympathy with some of the views of Karl Marx. So you must be one of those dangerous sorts who want to overthrow the government.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

As intelligent members of the jury, you can't find my client Fernandez guilty. Fernandez grew up in a poor family, as did many of you, and found life difficult. Your vote will show whether you understand this.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Karl Marx was a personal failure who couldn't support his family. So his political theory must be wrong.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Wong wore this headband and then kicked two long field goals. The headband brought him good luck.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Believing in miracles is unreasonable, since no responsible person believes in them. How about Wong? Well, the mere fact that he believes in miracles shows that he is not responsible.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Let's ask how some people could be fooled into thinking that Smith is a better candidate than myself.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

This new book by Hughes explains why Christianity spread so fast in the ancient world. He thus refutes Christianity.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Most people believe that Toyotas are excellent cars. So they must be right.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

This used Ford won't cost you much. The payments will only come to about $20 a day. Now $20 is not much at all these days.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Hitler once talked to a group concerned with the threat of a Nazi-imposed dictatorship. He spent his time denouncing the evils of pacifism.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Since we haven't been able to prove that there is no God, we must conclude that there is a God.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Hilton and the other woman's libbers deny all difference between male and female. But this is absurd, as anyone with eyes can see.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Dr. Miller, if you don't pass me in this course then I'll get depressed and my self-image will sink even lower. Surely you could give me at least a D!

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Dr. Jones and all other competent authorities say we'll land on Mars within fifty years. So this must be true.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

The equal rights amendment was foolish, since its woman's lib sponsors were nothing but bra-less bubbleheads.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Our enemies -- the democrats -- are against this bill. So the bill must be pretty good.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Do you still beat your wife?

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

No New Yorkers care about their fellow human beings.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Gensler must disagree with me, since she is irrational. And Gensler must be irrational, since she disagrees with me.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Ultimately, only pleasure is able to be desired. So only pleasure is ultimately desirable. So only pleasure is worth seeking.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

A lot of people are saying that Smith will be the next republican candidate. So this is sure to happen.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

President Jones's veto was the right move. In these troubled times we need decisive leadership, even in the face of opposition. We should thank him for his courageous move.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

I oppose this bill. Contrary to what the republicans think, this bill won't solve all of our problems.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Look at all the bad things that happened while my socialist opponent Martinez was in office. If you don't want to elect an official who will bring about such things, then vote against my opponent.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Dr. Hughes, my parents will get mad at me if I get a D -- and I will feel so bad inside. Please? You know how I loved your course. I surely deserve at least a C.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

We haven't been able to disprove the existence of an afterlife. Therefore we should affirm the existence of an afterlife.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

So you didn't like my book, Connolly. What defect in your character do you attribute this to?

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

The way I figure it, people are either logical types who have little emotion or else emotional types who care little about logical reasoning.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Each part of my essay is brilliant. So my essay must be brilliant.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Believing in miracles is unreasonable, since no responsible person believes in them. How about Connolly? Well, the mere fact that she believes in miracles shows that she is not responsible.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Dr. Boyle of the biology department has spent years researching the effects of marijuana. He says that marijuana is harmless. So this must be true.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Surely, Miller, you agree that I deserve a raise. After all, you wouldn't want people to hear about how you cheat on your expense account!

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Martinez is intelligent and has a lot of experience in politics. So you should vote for her.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

No one accepts Hilton's theory any more. So his theory must be wrong.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Dr. Weiss in his course explains how the modern belief in universal human rights arose in a specific historical context. He concludes that there is no objective basis for this belief.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Martinez and the other Christians are pretty stupid. They all believe that the world was created in six days. None of them cares anything about science.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Greene made an appointment to see me. But of course she didn't show. Students are all irresponsible.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Nietzsche said that the Christian "Love thy neighbor" was shallow and wrong. But Nietzsche later went insane. This shows that he was wrong.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

This new socialist proposal is really exciting. I love it! We should all vote for it.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

This is a great team. So Greene, who is on this team, must be a great player.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Whenever I go camping it seems to rain. I'm going backpacking next week. So watch for rain!

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Miller states that her company has been unable to prove that these cigarettes are dangerous. So they must be safe.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Most college students are mainly concerned with sports, liquor, and sex. So this is normal. But Jones is mainly concerned with poetry. So her case is abnormal and hence not healthy.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Hondas are expensive and hard to get repaired. So you shouldn't buy one.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

The gorgeous actress Ms. Hilton says that this is the best brand of shaving cream -- and that she goes wild over men who use it. So I'm getting this brand!

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Belief in God is to be explained in terms of one's need for a father-figure. Hence this belief is false.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Why is the socialist party so much more responsive to the real needs of the people?

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Martinez must like me. He told me he likes me -- and he said that he always tells the truth to people he likes.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Either you're willing to fight to defend your country, or you aren't a good citizen.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Miller is a logician. So she must be a non-emotional person. You probably know that logicians are non-emotional.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Practically every heroin addict first tried marijuana. So marijuana causes heroin addiction.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Almost everyone I know thinks that Chevrolet stock is going to fall sharply. So it surely will.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

You better keep quiet about my illegal activities, Fernandez. Neither of us wants unfortunate accidents to happen.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

We can't take seriously Fernandez's plea for lower tax rates for corporations. Fernandez is the head of a large company and thus he stands to gain from lower taxes.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

My friend Wilson with a PhD in physics says that atomic power plants are safe. So he must be right.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

We haven't been able to prove the existence of an afterlife. Therefore we should deny the existence of an afterlife.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

You agree that we ought to elect liberals. So you have to conclude that we ought to elect Brown -- since she's a "liberal" in my sense (= "someone opposed to setting up an hereditary monarchy").

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Pontiacs are inexpensive and get good gas mileage. So you should get a Pontiac.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Religion originated from myth. Myth, of course, consists in superstitious errors. So religion must be false.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Boyle and the other atheists are pretty stupid. They deny God's existence because they can't see him. But who has seen electrons either?

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Each part of life has a purpose. Your eyes, hands, and so forth all have a purpose. Hence life itself must have a purpose.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

As intelligent members of the jury, you can't find my client Gensler guilty. Gensler grew up in a poor family, as did many of you, and found life difficult. Your vote will show whether you understand this.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

The bible must tell the truth. After all, it is God's word. How do I know that it is God's word? Well, the bible says it is -- and the bible tells the truth.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Hughes: "Playing on the basketball team is the best education you can get in college." Friend: "Can't classes teach you more?" Hughes: "Well, most athletes are good scholars; for example ...."

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Ms. Fernandez brushed her teeth with Ultra Zest and then attracted boys like a magnet! Wow -- I'm going to get some Ultra Zest, because then I will attract boys too!

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

This teacher gets rave reviews from most people. So the teacher must be pretty good.

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

I'm right! If you disagree with me, you get sent to your room!

What fallacy(s) does this illustrate?

Academic philosophers these days are all logical positivists. None of them accept a spiritual dimension of humanity.
